thread.title: BRIEF-Silicon Motion Technology Sees Q1 Revenue To Be Near Midpoint Of Original Guidance Range Of $127 Mln To $132 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Silicon Motion Technology Sees Q1 Revenue To Be Near Midpoint Of Original Guidance Range Of $127 Mln To $132 Mln
text:
April 9 (Reuters) - Silicon Motion Technology Corp:
* SILICON MOTION ANNOUNCES PRELIMINARY FIRST QUARTER 2018 REVENUE AND EARNINGS CONFERENCE CALL DETAILS
* SILICON MOTION TECHNOLOGY CORP SEES Q1 REVENUE TO BE NEAR MIDPOINT OF ORIGINAL GUIDANCE RANGE OF $127 MILLION TO $132 MILLION
* GAAP) TO BE IN UPPER HALF OF ORIGINAL GUIDANCE RANGE OF 46.5% TO 48.5%
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $129.6 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
